instructions.de: Am Kreisverkehr geradeaus weiterfahren Richtung Destination 1
instructions.es: En la rotonda continúe recto hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda continúa recto hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, continuer tout droit en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Di bundaran tetap lurus menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Alla rotonda prosegui dritto verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Rechtdoor op de rotonde richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Na rondzie kontynuuj prosto w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória siga em frente sentido Destination 1
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu continuați înainte spre Destination 1
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta Destination 1 istikametinde düz devam et
instructions.uk: Продовжуйте рух прямо у напрямку Destination 1
